matchmaking in eastern europe is pretty fun, you get to meet so many vatniks and russian children who blast music or scream every time they die. It is truly a challenge, but it makes you stronger.

Best toxic thing I have ever had in a while XD.
Very fun game if u like players with 12000 DPI spinning and flicking to your head. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who enjoys not playing a game.
Love - Hate relationship with this game. You get annoyed and tired of it once in a while, leave the game and then come back because it's one of a kind.
Game is highly recommended but too many cheaters and I'm not sure if valve is doing anything about it (WE HOPE THEY DO!)
